name: Mark D. Rusciano
body:
(952) 452-4825 rusciano@iastate.edu In-Session Address | Permanent Address ------------------ | ----------------- 101 N Hyland Ave, Apt. 3
Ames, IA 50014 | 15316 Lake Rose Ln.
Minnetonka, MN 55345 ##Education ###Iowa State University - Ames, IA August 2013 – (est.) May 2017 Major: Electrical Engineering Minor: Computer Science GPA: **3.35** ##Work Experience ###Danfoss Power Solutions - Ames, IA _Controls Engineering Intern_ May 2014 - Present - Programming manufacturing quality assurance systems in Ladder Logic and Python - Designing modular UI blocks for operator instruction panels. Focus on reusability and ease of use. - Creating and updating industrial schematics in AutoCAD Electrical ###Oak Ridge Country Club – Hopkins, MN _Server Assistant/Valet Parker_ August 2011 – August 2013 - Coordinated the set up and take down of multiple 300+ person events - Provided prompt and friendly service for the members and the servers on the dining staff ##Activities ###Iowa State Make to Innovate: Team MAVRIC _Electrical Team Lead_ May 2014 - Present - Leading team in building and programming a complete electrical system - Programming manual and autonomous control systems on an onboard microcontroller in C++ - Developing a vision processing system in Python to supplement autonomous function - Implementing custom serial communications tolerant of low signal strength conditions _Electrical Development Team_ October 2013 – May 2014 - Machined and programmed robotic arm to accept serial control commands in C++ ###Delta Upsilon Fraternity _VP Finance_ December 2013 – May 2014 - Managed over $25,000 in funds for over 50 students, reporting the financial situation weekly - Implemented QuickBooks and converted previous financial records ###Reggie's Sleepout: Team Brickheads _Building Team_ October 2013 – November 2013 - Assisted in the fabrication of a 25+ foot tall Lego Minifig made of cardboard - Coordinated donations of building materials, raising $6500 for the Iowa Homeless Youth Centers ##Skills - Java, Python, C++ - Embedded Systems Programming - Basic Web Development - Industrial Automation - Basic Circuit Design - Microsoft Word and Excel (Advanced) - AutoCAD Electrical (Intermediate) - FCC Amateur Radio License: General Class
